attributes.action: Scrap plans for the Broughton Bypass (near Preston)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The problem of congestion in Broughton could be easily solved by adding a new motorway junction after M6 Junc 32, which would help expanding towns (e.g. Garstang) too by giving them a convenient exit. The current bypass plans will eventually exacerbate the problem by attracting more housing developments and traffic to the village and will spoil a lot of precious countryside.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap plans for the Broughton Bypass (near Preston)"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page16029.asp

Prime Minister's Office
